auth.confirmation-sent: Registration confirmation will be emailed to you.
auth.confirm-age: I am 18 years old or over
auth.confirm-marketing: I would prefer to receive marketing messages from Penalty
auth.delete-account-text: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
auth.form-privacy-text: To learn more about how Penalty collects, uses, shares and protects your personal data, please see Penalty's Privacy Policy.
auth.form-tos-text: By clicking on sign-up, you agree to Penalty's Terms and Conditions of Use.
auth.signup-question: Don't have an account? Sign up

cookie-banner.text: We use cookies to enhance your site experience, analyze site performance and customize content and advertisements. By choosing "Accept", you agree to store all categories of cookies on your device. If you wish to reject some or all categories of cookies, please click "Settings"
cookie-banner.text-extended: Our site uses three types of cookies as described below. You can adjust all of your cookie settings below. To learn more about the cookies we use on our site, please read our Cookie Policy. By accepting, you consent to the use of cookies.
cookie-banner.text-functional: Functional cookies allow us to remember choices you make (such as your username, and language preference). The information these cookies collect may be anonymized and cannot track your browsing activity on other websites. If you do not allow these cookies, then some or all of these services may not function properly.
cookie-banner.text-necessary: Strictly necessary cookies should always be enabled. They help us make our website usable, enabling you to move around the site and use its features. You cannot turn off these cookies because they are required to deliver security, enable core site functionality, and help you use our site's features and services as you would expect (including remembering your cookie consent preferences).
cookie-banner.text-third-party: Third-party cookies include performance cookies and targeting cookies. Performance cookies collect information about how you use a website, e.g. which pages you go to most often and if you get error messages from web pages. These cookies don’t collect information that identifies you personally as a visitor, although they might collect the IP address of the device you use to access the site. Targeting cookies collect information about your browsing habits. They are usually placed by advertising networks such as Google. The cookies remember that you have visited a website, and this information is shared with other organizations such as media publishers.
cookie-banner.title: Our site uses cookies

team-about.main: {teamName}'s live results, team roster, the season's timetable, and today's outcomes can be accessed on Penalty.com.
team-about.upcoming-select: Select one of the leagues in the matches section to find the {teamName}'s upcoming game.
team-about.upcoming-once: Once the game starts, you can keep track of {teamName}'s live score, current rank, live results that are updated minute-by-minute, and game statistics.
team-about.upcoming-we: We might have video recaps containing goals and commentary for some {teamName} games, but only if they play in one of the most prominent football leagues.
team-about.recent-last: {teamName}'s last game was against {otherTeamName} in {leagueName}, concluding with a score of {gameLocalResult} - {gameVisitorResult}
team-about.recent-fixtures: The fixtures section for {teamName} exhibits the most recent football games across various leagues and championships, with statistics and icons indicating wins, draws, or losses.
team-about.recent-also: It also shows all the scheduled games that {teamName} will participate in the future.
team-about.performance: {teamName}'s performance statistics is a unique feature offered by Penalty.com, informed by the team's past 15 games, detailed analytics, and our expertise. Leveraging this feature may help predict the outcomes of future {teamName} games.
team-about.squad-current: The current squad of {teamName}, their stats, and individual performances can be seen on this webpage.
team-about.stats: Additionally, there are stats for each player across all competitions, displaying total games played and started, minutes on the field, total goals, number of cards received, and more.
team-about.topscorers: {teamName}'s top scorers list is updated in real-time during every game.
team-about.clicking: Clicking on any player from the roster will display personal details such as nationality, birthdate, height, preferred foot, position, player value, transfer history, etc.
team-about.visit: Visit our homepage for the day's football timetable and outcomes.

match-about.finished: The {leagueName} fixture that featured {localTeamName} against {visitorTeamName}, held on {date}, kicked off at {time} UTC at the {venue}, concluded with a final scoreline of {localTeamScore} - {visitorTeamScore}.
match-about.other: {localTeamName} is set to face off against {visitorTeamName} on {date}, with the kick-off scheduled for {time} UTC, at the {venue}. This match is a part of the {leagueName}.
match-about.h2h: To analyze how {localTeamName} previously performed against {visitorTeamName}, you can refer to past results or use our head-to-head (H2H) comparison tool. Interested in comparing top-rated players from both sides? Penalty.com utilizes a comprehensive rating system that evaluates each player's performance based on many data points.
match-about.livescore: Penalty.com's live score feature allows you to access all prior {localTeamName} vs {visitorTeamName} results, sorted by their H2H matches. Furthermore, it offers a dynamic way to track this game's live score through various sports features. This means you can:
match-about.two: Access real-time data indicating which team is controlling the game using Advanced Stats (both full-time and half-time)
match-about.three: Monitor detailed stats such as ball possession, shots, corner kicks, significant opportunities created, cards, key passes, duels, and more
match-about.five: Follow all home and away matches for each team in the {leagueName}
match-about.predict: All these elements can assist you in predicting the outcome of the {localTeamName} vs {visitorTeamName} match.
match-about.watch: Wondering where to watch {localTeamName} vs. {visitorTeamName}? In the TV Channels section, you can locate all the channels broadcasting the {localTeamName} – {visitorTeamName} live match.
match-about.name: Name: {localTeamName} - {visitorTeamName}
match-about.app: The Penalty.com live score is accessible as an Android app on Google Play and Huawei AppGallery. We're available in various languages as "Penalty.com". Install the Penalty.com app and follow {localTeamName} vs {visitorTeamName} live on your mobile device!

league-about.main: Welcome to the {leagueName} ({countryName}) page on Penalty.com, your comprehensive destination for all things related to {countryName}'s top-flight football. This page is your gateway to explore the rich history and current happenings of one of the most exciting leagues in the world.
league-about.second: Our league page is designed to provide you with up-to-the-minute data on the ongoing season and a deep dive into historical seasons. Navigate through the years to relive the thrilling victories, the heartbreaking losses, and the spectacular performances that define {leagueName} football.
league-about.matches: The Matches tab provides detailed data and statistics about the current season and round fixtures. We provide in-depth information about each match, from team lineups to key events, ensuring you don't miss any action.
league-about.matches-live: Stay tuned to live updates for ongoing matches. As goals are scored, cards are issued, or substitutions are made, you'll be the first to know. Our live updates section offers real-time information, giving you the feel of being in the stadium.
league-about.main-cup: Welcome to the {leagueName} page on Penalty.com, your comprehensive destination for all things related to {countryName}'s football cup competition. This page is your gateway to explore the rich history and current happenings of one of the most exciting knock-out tournaments in the world.
league-about.second-cup: Our cup page is designed to provide you with up-to-the-minute data on the ongoing tournament and a deep dive into historical tournaments. Navigate through the years to relive the thrilling victories, the heartbreaking losses, and the spectacular performances that define the {leagueName}.
league-about.matches-cup: The Matches tab provides detailed data and statistics about the current round and tournament fixtures. We provide in-depth information about each match, from team lineups to key events, ensuring you don't miss any action.
league-about.matches-live-cup: Stay tuned to live updates for ongoing matches. As goals are scored, cards are issued, or substitutions are made, you'll be the first to know. Our live updates section offers real-time information, giving you the feel of being in the stadium.
league-about.draw-cup: We offer an additional function for the top championships - the Qualification Draw. This feature tracks a team's route from the group stage to the final. It's a visual representation of the tournament bracket, allowing you to see at a glance the matches a team has played and their potential future opponents. It gives you an understanding of a team's journey, highlighting their victories and challenges. A must-have tool for any football enthusiast!
league-about.standings: Our Standings tab provides dynamic tables updated in real time. Get insights into the current form of each team in the league and the power to compare each team against each other, enabling you to predict outcomes and spot emerging trends.
league-about.players: Delve into the Players tab to explore top scorers from all league teams. Our extensive stats offer a deep dive into their performance, from goals scored to assists provided, allowing you to follow your favorite players' progress throughout the season.
league-about.sidelined: In addition to the Players tab, don't miss out on our Sidelined tab. This section gives you critical information about players currently out due to injuries or suspensions within the {leagueName}. This feature is especially important for fans who want to keep track of player availability, as it may significantly influence a team's performance in upcoming matches.
league-about.transfers: The Transfers tab brings you comprehensive information about the transfers related to the {leagueName}. From the latest transfer windows to those dating back 20 years, get detailed insights into the ingoing and outgoing transfers.
league-about.trophies: Finally, in our Trophies tab, you'll find a compilation of each season's winners. Revel in the glory of past champions, and trace the history of the league's legendary teams.
league-about.last: So, whether you are a die-hard fan looking for in-depth analysis or a casual viewer seeking to catch up on the latest matches, Penalty.com is your one-stop destination for all things {leagueName}. Dive in, and enjoy the beautiful game!

player-about.born: Born on {bornDate}, and standing {height} cm tall and weighs in at {weight} kg, {playerName}, at the age of {age}, takes the field for {teamName}.
player-about.main: Donning the jersey with the number {position} is {playerName}.
player-about.career: Penalty.com houses all the career details of {playerName}, including statistics, match ratings, and a goals tally, from the present and past seasons. In the right corner, you can find {playerName}'s current rating on Penalty.com and the platform offering an easy way to follow the rating trajectory.
player-about.lineup: Confirmation regarding {playerName}'s inclusion in the {teamName} squad will be available on Penalty.com an hour prior to kickoff.
player-about.when: When {playerName} is in action, you can keep track of the live Penalty.com rating and statistics. The footballer's profile on Penalty.com contains an exhaustive record of every match and competition {playerName} has partaken in, complete with key stats for each competition, such as average Penalty.com rating, matches played, goals scored, assists provided, cards received, and other pertinent data.
player-about.trophies: A visit to the trophies section on Penalty.com will reveal the number and kind of accolades {playerName} has been awarded.
player-about.sidelined: Additionally, a Sidelined section provides information about periods when {playerName} was unavailable due to injuries or suspensions.

home-about.about: Penalty.com delivers real-time football scores from over 750 global soccer leagues and tournaments. Along with live score updates, the site provides in-depth statistics, updated league standings, video highlights, and fixture schedules. It allows easy tracking of all live match details, including scores, goal assists, cards, substitutions, and more.

competitions-about.title: About
competitions-about.domestic: You're on the Domestic Leagues page. Select the relevant country from the list above. Upon selection, you can choose a league, with the current season being displayed automatically.
competitions-about.domestic-cup: You're on the Domestic Cups page. Choose your preferred country. Once selected, you can choose a domestic cup competition, with the current season showing up automatically.
competitions-about.international: You're on the 'International Leagues' page. Select the relevant continent from the list above. Go ahead and choose a league; the ongoing season will be shown automatically.
competitions-about.international-cup: You're on 'International Cups' page, you can directly select an international cup competition by selecting a specific continent. The current season is displayed automatically once the cup is active.

teams-about.title: About
teams-about.domestic: You're on 'Domestic Team List' page. Your first step is to choose the country where the team is based. Following this, select the specific domestic league in which the team participates. This two-step process ensures you can find detailed information about any global team playing in domestic leagues.
teams-about.national: You're on 'National Team List' page. Begin by selecting the team's home country. Once you've done that, choose the championship the team is currently participating in. This straightforward approach will provide comprehensive information about national teams participating in various championships worldwide.

players-about.title: About
players-about.topscorers: You're on the Top Scorers list to delve into the details of top-performing football players. This list includes the player's name, their team, the competition they're participating in, total goals scored, penalty goals, and player ratings, sorted by the number of goals. A convenient search function lets you find players based on their home country, position number, nationality, weight, height, or birthdate.
players-about.cardscorers: You're on our card scorers list which provides a comprehensive view of footballers' disciplinary records. Columns include player name, team, competition, yellow and red cards received, and disciplinary points. Use the search function to find players based on their home country, position number, nationality, weight, height, or birthdate.
players-about.abroad: The playing abroad list offers a glimpse into footballers' careers outside their home country. The list includes the player's name, the team they play for, the competition, their goal and penalty goal count, and their country of origin. Use our search function to locate players based on their home country, position number, nationality, weight, height, or birthdate.
players-about.borntoday: Celebrate with footballers on their special day with our 'Players Born Today' list. This list presents the player's name, their team, the competition they're partaking in, and their birth year. Our function lets you search for players based on their home country, position number, nationality, weight, height, or birthdate.

h2h-about.title: About
h2h-about.empty: Begin your head-to-head (H2H) comparison journey by deciding whether you want to compare Domestic or National teams. Upon choosing, select the country that the team you're interested in represents. Once the country has been chosen, you'll be prompted to select the league in which the team competes. Finally, you will choose the specific team you wish to analyze, followed by selecting the opposing team you want to compare it with.
h2h-about.result: Once you've entered your selected teams, you're ready to compare Team A and Team B's performance.
h2h-about.main: You've pre-entered your selected teams, so you're ready to compare {teamNameA} ({countryA}) and {teamNameB} ({countryB})'s performance. The Head 2 Head tab presents all previous matches between these two teams, providing an excellent snapshot of their historical rivalry and performances. Moving on to the matches tab, you can examine each team's performance in the current and past seasons across various leagues and championships.
h2h-about.main-national: You've pre-entered your selected teams, so you're ready to compare {teamNameA} and {teamNameB}'s performance. The Head 2 Head tab presents all previous matches between these two teams, providing an excellent snapshot of their historical rivalry and performances. Moving on to the matches tab, you can examine each team's performance in the current and past seasons across various leagues and championships.
h2h-about.players: The players tab is for a more granular comparison. Here you can directly compare the performance of players from both teams, including top scorers, assist providers, and card receivers.
h2h-about.team: The team tab will be your go-to if you're interested in team stats. It allows you to compare essential statistics, trophy counts for each team, and the distribution of scoring minutes, giving you a comprehensive view of each team's prowess and performance history.

rate.text: Want to share the love by giving us a 5 star rating on Google Play? It takes less than a minute and feels great.
